body: i like stories with sloppy relationships but this is just like “huh?” you got a girl who’s in love with a fuckboy who doesn’t really value her so she tries to even the score by fucking some other dude behind his back, at that point their relationship makes zero fucking sense.
if i can give a thumbs down to this author i would. al the characters he/she makes are plain retards. like get a life. u lived in vain. art's are gud tho.
The mc messed up when he say he love her, that's why the fmc felt betrayed because now she know she's the only one suffering, he should have said nothing and tried to win her heart slowly
Man this reminds me of my shitty GF in college, good thing I didn't get serious with until someone told me that she was fuccing one of my friends behind my back

I had friends that basically like this story some years ago, like 6 or 7 years ago. Obviously, no one knew the affairs, but when it blew up and 4 of them started making post on facebook defending themselves while trying to put the blam on others... hoo boy, that was a drama with highest level of toxicity facebook could provided.

So what I understand is Akkun and Mei cheated in the head of the moment, but Mei regretted it. MC had always loved Yukino, and seized this chance to take her for himself. Yukino loved Akkun, so she turned down MC's confession, but they developed a physical relationship in which Yukino reached out to him whenever she wanted to vent her frustration for Akkun. Yeah, truly toxic.

Anyway, the art is great. I hate any bad ending hentai plot that is too real but in the end, fuck reason. The "I have been waiting" in the end got me laughing hard. Like, damn, this is a death flag. And i relate to youta "yeah, finally, one step closer to you"

When mei and akkun cheat, akkun is in the wrong for taking advantage and mei is.. She made the chances but they 4 are close friends so she trusted akkun on that, and clearly akkun is the instigator here. When Yukino and youta cheat, its because youta started it and yukino is confused (and angry, who wouldnt). From all this, mei is the most fair, and akkun is a d*ck. Yukino is hurting because she wants akkun to treat her special, and youta always waited for this chances. I mean, if i were in youta's place i will choose mei if i want to avoid war. But youta held onto his early loves and this situation is preferable if i were in his shoes. "I only want to fuck you, only you. I dont give a fuck for anything else. Lets fuck" luckily, youta get the plot armor "sex with you feels better".
"Youta, you wouldnt understand" Yukino love hachiman- ekhm, akkun. But akkun is a player, kinda. But youta loves yukino, and it hurts yukino even more. "I am the only one who betray myself"
Man Edogawa so good
All should just break up and find new relationships lmao.
toxic relationships, the blond short hair girl is the one paying for all the pain someday.
do hentais need to be this toxic lolololool
Fuck off for that girl

Ngl, I didn't understand at all but yeah, once I was in that situation.

Well this is just empty. Quite nice than the usual NTR/Cheating

All Chara is shit. especially short hair girl boyfriends, He's the one who started triggering the short hair's disloyalty
This shit is pure toxicity man...Ain't no way shit is going good with this...Both the mc's are fucked up...

@madman lol why you pointing out the guys as the toxic ones? The women themselves have cheated, and in FeMC’s case, clearly on purpose multiple times, even the blonde girl is kinda shitty for acting like nothing bad happened because she confessed, not actually making up for it or to prove she’s better than the cheating incident. Sure MC is kinda playing around too much, what with being with the blonde chick for no real reason given(although he’s clearly giving her what she wants as well), but he also stated that he’s basically stopped caring about everyone and is just around for the kicks of it so if anything my man is coming out on top.
I'll take advantage of this bitch , I meant free sex . She is pathetic .
They both should just move on, cut off contracts if needed be. But i guess it is easier said than done.
This one is depressing
This doesn't look like it's getting a part 2 anytime soon
Feels bad for MC and FMC. All of them should separate and cut all contacts after the cheating incident, so that they weren't trapped in such toxic and mental abusive relationship.
Oof. Mc only stands to lose. Rejected by the woman he loves and is not only her outlet to satisfy he insecurities. Feelsbadman
I love the plot and the arts

4 people , 2 couple , one guy is a player and girl is nice but sadistic other couple girl legit made a mistake and guy inlove with other chick- cheating occurs- MCs chick confessed while Player just “o well” FMC and MC cheat to even out but FMC like the thrill of cheating sex since her now Fiance a player while MC kinda stuck as a Living Dildo
She fuck up but at least relief herself on good guy
Y'all know the consequence of fucking someone else beside your girlfriend/boyfriend without getting caught. That thrilling feeling? Betrayal? Mmmm boi. Wait until you impregnated her.
man I thought it was be some  bitter sweet ending where everyone is happy. but nope.

So this is what it feels like to be a college life eh
What we learn from this manga is, When something crack it's not easy to make it like it never happen, there's always some scar left

When someone did cheat once, usually they won't stop because they feel that not being caught red-handed means they could continue to do so and sometimes uneasy feeling to their partner could be fading over time to the line they became addicted by it. The worst thing is this could be a true story or even has been happened irl. I just hope this doesn't continue to "abusive relationship" zone. They are deserved to be happy.
At least mei feels guilty about what she has done.
i hate these kind of shit. both fucking losers in life. and fucking deserves it. if u gonna keep quiet when she taken away then keep at it for life. man this is pissing me off.
@🔵MadMan🔴 facts bro😤 prolly the saddest stuff I seen on the site. they were fake all along

This a damn masterpiece bruh typical ntr? I think not!! This is literally a cut above the rest of ntr I've read. This one makes the reader wonder "what would I do if I was in that situation?" Now you might say every ntr does this but the aspects that influence the desision is completely different. Forget the brain-dead fuckery bout would kill, slaughter and whatever is illogical that comes to the children's minds that gather here. Everyone has a different approach to this and your approach can tell someone what type of person you are(not that I give a fuck). This is blessedly corrupt and I love every panel of it props to edogawa you're definitely securing the bag with this one🔥 what the four of them had wasn't genuine........really hits home and make you feel bad. I kinda see why vanilla lovers tend to stay away from ntr. Respect my vanilla doujin enthusiasts. Pain😔

Pretty complicated relationship, mc is an asshole simp using blondie to stay close the fmc. The two women love them too much to let them go, but are seeking comfort elsewhere because they don't think their bf's love them and their right, at least blondie is, and fmc's bf is a dickhead treating her like a doormat because he knows he can get away with it, especially after she forgave him. All 4 characters are trash if it was "irl" the 2 women should just move on because the guys are toxic, but this just hentai so i will shut the fuck up because this rant is pointless.
@Bml69420 someone doesn't know the truth about adults...
Never give a cheater a second chance. Cuz they’ll take it
such stories suck. she must to love that guy or leave

Don’t get me wrong, it’s still a fucked up story. I don’t love these kinds of stories, but i’m interested in where this is going. Looking forward to part 2 if the author is making it! (also their partners cheated on them first, so I don’t feel bad)

Wow this is really interesting, and this is coming from a guy who loves vanilla and hates NTR and cheating stories. I hope the author is making a part 2 (I read hentai for the plot btw, I’ve only jacked off to doujins and pornwhas twice, I’m not joking)
His art is just so good

waahooooo what a story
Toxic relationship all of them got man, Youta should move on from Yukino, he loves her but isnt reciprocated and in the long run it will only hurt him as she stated she only loves the other dude.
Mmmh, pretty trash people overall, if you're not okay with this why wouldn't you talk lmao ... Pretty dumb storyline unfortunately .
Yukino knows that her boyfriend will always cheat on her so why doesn't she just get with Youta?
I love this artist's stories and art style. Sadly, it seems like they aren't drawing long stories like this anymore and have switched to illustrations and single page art now.
Hmmmm, what an interesting case of cheating among friends. And the title of this is quite befitting to this plot, a complex mash-up of entitlement & punishment.
